item.title: The OWL Project
item.description: What? Last year, I spent some time exploring the possibility of a news analysis ecosystem built on-chain. Here is the exploratory whitepaper detailing the concept: Introduction There is an incomprehensible amount of information circulating on the internet. Over 4 billion humans connected to the web are constantly adding to the collection, each with their own implicit and explicit biases shaping how they perceive and propagate the information with which they interact.
